values.description: Build and push Docker image to ECR
values.name: static-nginx-dev-build

values.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
values.name: static-nginx-dev-vpce-sg

after.description: Build and push Docker image to ECR
after.name: static-nginx-dev-build

after.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
after.name: static-nginx-dev-vpce-sg

alb_dns_name.description: ALB DNS name (use this if you don't configure Route53).

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL to push images to.

description.constant_value: Build and push Docker image to ECR
Security group for interface VPC endpoints

domain_name.description: Optional: Route53 record name to create (e.g., www.example.com). Leave empty to skip Route53+ACM.

enable_waf.description: Whether to attach an AWS WAFv2 Web ACL with AWS managed rules to the ALB.

hosted_zone_id.description: Optional: Route53 hosted zone id for domain_name. Required if domain_name is set.
